General.Name: Kredyt Inkaso SA
General.Description: Kredyt Inkaso S.A. provides debt management services in Poland, Russia, Romania, Luxembourg, Bulgaria, and Croatia. The company engages in debt collection; mass litigation and enforcement proceedings; and development, commercialization, and trading of real estate. It serves banks, and insurance and telecommunication companies. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is based in Warsaw, Poland.
